isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - PERFORMANCE DIAGNOSTICS - Test Procedures - Key On Engine Running Standard Test

svcproc.title: Key On Engine Running Standard Test
svcproc.para: To verify that the engine sensors and IPR are operating correctly within their specified operating ranges. The ECM will exercise the IPR and monitor sensor feedback signals. If a sensor or IPR problem exists, the ECM will transmit DTCs to the EST.

item.para: Electronic Service Tool (EST) with Master Diagnostics software

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the foreword of this manual. Follow all warnings, cautions, and notes.

step1.para: Open KOER Standard.ssn to monitor engine operation.

warning.para: To prevent serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle - comply with the following:
When running the engine in the service bay, make sure the parking brake is set, the transmission is in neutral, and the wheels are blocked.

step1.para: Start and run engine to reach minimum operating temperature 70°C (158°F).

note.para: Engine coolant temperature must reach 70°C (158°F) minimum for the ECM to accurately test engine actuators and sensors. If engine coolant temperature is below self test range, the EST will display - Coolant temperature is out of range.

figure.caption: Key On Engine Running Standard Test

step1.para: Select Key On Engine Running Tests from the drop down menu.
From the Key On Engine Running Diagnostics Menu, select Standard Test and click Run to start the test.
The ECM will start the Key On Engine Running Standard Test and command the engine to accelerate to a predetermined engine RPM.

During the test, the ECM commands the IPR through a Step Test to determine if the ICP system is performing as expected. The ECM monitors signal values from the ICP sensor and compares those values to the expected values. When the test is done, the ECM returns the engine to the normal operating mode and transmits any DTCs set during the test.
Record all DTCs on Performance Diagnostics form.

svcproc.para: See Appendix B in this manual for DTCs.

item.para: Oil leakage in high pressure Injection Control System
Loose or corroded engine wiring harness for ICP
Open or shorted wiring harness to ICP or IPR
